entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 8:21 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
